segments.text: Jane , we are going to have a board meeting next Friday . Will you please arrange it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , Mr . Robert . But can I have your plan ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Actually it's a routine board meeting . The things to be discussed are all written here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . May I keep it ? I need it to draw up a notice of the meeting and the agenda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go ahead . It's for your reference . While you are at it , make me a special agenda and don't forget to have enough room at the side for notes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean you need a more detailed agenda for yourself ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . As I am supposed to the chair of the meeting , I don't want it to get out of control .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Ok , then where do you think we will have the meeting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The conference room on the second floor , is that ok ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will see that the room is ready by Friday . And I will check there are enough chairs , and the lighting and air-conditioning are all right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good , and please get some water , glasses and ash tray ready as well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I will . What about the minutes ? Do you think I am responsible for that too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely . The minutes have to be taken accurately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I am not familiar with the members of the board .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's easy . I will write you a list of their names . You can make a seating plan with the names and give each one a number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . All right , I â€™ ll withdraw and get down to it if you don't mind .
segments.speaker: S2
